title: Ticket #586: Allow configuration of DAGMan cycle time (currently 5 sec fixed)
description:
Right now DAGMan has a fixed 5 second time for getting called back by daemoncore. This means that 5 seconds is the fastest that DAGMan can possible cycle through checking the logs for events. For some people with many small jobs, a faster cycle time would be good.

This should be real easy -- just make an appropriate config parameter, and use that value in the daemonCore->Register_Timer() call.
